features.title: 100% Organic & Chemical-Free
features.description: Grown in carefully controlled environments without pesticides or artificial additives.

features.title: Harvested Daily
features.description: Picked at peak freshness every morning to ensure maximum flavor and nutritional value.

features.title: Fast Local Delivery
features.description: Delivered to your door within hours of harvest, supporting our local community.

process.title: Natural Spawn
process.description: We start with certified organic spawn in a sterile, nutrient-rich substrate.

process.title: Controlled Environment
process.description: Our climate-controlled growing rooms maintain perfect humidity and temperature.

process.title: Daily Monitoring
process.description: Each batch is monitored for optimal growth and health by our expert growers.

process.title: Hand Harvested
process.description: Every mushroom is carefully hand-picked at the perfect moment of maturity.

products.name: Pearl Oyster
products.description: Classic, delicate flavor with a velvety texture. Perfect for sautéing and soups.

products.name: Blue Oyster
products.description: Earthy and robust with striking blue-grey caps. Excellent for grilling.

products.name: Golden Oyster
products.description: Vibrant yellow caps with a slightly nutty flavor. Beautiful in salads.

products.name: Pink Oyster
products.description: Stunning pink color with a bacon-like flavor when cooked. A true delicacy.

about.title: Our Story
about.content: We are a small family-run oyster mushroom farm dedicated to sustainable, organic cultivation. Our journey began with a simple passion for growing clean, nutritious food for our community. Every mushroom we grow is nurtured with care, harvested with respect, and delivered with pride.

team.name: Alex Chen
team.bio: With 15 years of experience in mycology, Alex oversees our cultivation process and ensures every mushroom meets our high standards.

team.name: Maria Rodriguez
team.bio: Maria manages our eco-friendly practices and community partnerships, ensuring we grow sustainably.

team.name: James Wilson
team.bio: James leads our harvesting team, hand-picking each mushroom at its peak of perfection.

team.name: Sophie Park
team.bio: Sophie connects with our local community and ensures our mushrooms reach those who appreciate them most.

pearl-oyster.name: Pearl Oyster
pearl-oyster.description: The classic oyster mushroom with a delicate, velvety texture and mild, slightly sweet flavor. Our most popular variety, perfect for all cooking methods.
pearl-oyster.longDescription: Pearl Oyster mushrooms are known for their delicate, fan-shaped caps and tender texture. They absorb flavors beautifully while maintaining a pleasant, slightly sweet taste. Grown in our climate-controlled rooms, these mushrooms are harvested at peak maturity to ensure optimal flavor and nutritional content.
cookingTips: Sauté with garlic and butter for a simple side dish
Add to soups and stews in the last 5 minutes of cooking
Grill with olive oil and herbs
Use in stir-fries with other fresh vegetables
pearl-oyster.storage: Store in paper bag in refrigerator for up to 5 days

blue-oyster.name: Blue Oyster
blue-oyster.description: Earthy and robust with striking blue-grey caps. Excellent for grilling and roasting.
blue-oyster.longDescription: Blue Oyster mushrooms are prized for their beautiful blue-grey coloration and meaty texture. They have a more robust flavor than Pearl Oysters, making them excellent for grilling and roasting. Their firm texture holds up well in cooking, and they develop a wonderful umami flavor when properly prepared.
cookingTips: Excellent for grilling - brush with oil and grill 2-3 minutes per side
Use in hearty stews and braises
Pair with red meats and game
blue-oyster.storage: Store in paper bag in refrigerator for up to 5 days
